reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We have just arrived back from a stay in the Gat Xino hostel and we were quite happy with the hostel. The rooms were very small but they were clean and had air conditioning, it can be noisy at night with the sounds from people walking up and down the hallways and banging doors. The food on offer for breakfast was limited but fresh, some fruit would be nice though. The staff were all very friendly and helpful and did a lot of research to try and find us an english speaking doctor. The area around the hostel is not the best, there was a police raid two streets away. Overall the hostel was expensive but it was on par price wise with other hostels/ hotels in the area. Please note the hotel does not have a life so don't stay here if you require wheelchair access.
reviews.title: Nice hotel not a great location
Great hostal,Horrible location.
reviews.text: Just returned from a great weekend enjoying my 40th birthday with a big bunch of lads in barcelona.We stayed at the"Gat xino" hostal.A very modern,clean,chic place to stay at a very reasonable 90 euro's per twin room per night.There was nothing wrong with the accomodation or the staff,or the breakfast.

reviews.title: basic and comfortable
reviews.text: The location in the raval area was the only problem!

It's up a narrow alley that can be dangerous at night ,even for single men,as one of our party will vouch for!Get a taxi if it's late or avoid useing the narrow alley to access the hostal,use the next one down towards the port ,it's slightly better.
reviews.title: Small Breakfast Room

reviews.text: For the money the Gat xino can't be beat ,clean,secure and great staff 24/7.
reviews.title: horrible, horrible location

reviews.text: The hostal is not in the best location. Although it is close to the Ramblas, it is about a 10 minute walk and it can be a little uncomfortable if you are walking alone. The hostal offers breakfast, private bath and clean rooms with a decent sized bathroom. There is no lift. The staff was the best part of the deal, very nice and informative. There is also internet and TV.
reviews.title: Nice place, bad location

reviews.text: We stayed at this hotel for 5 nights, and it was a very agreeable stay. Staff was very helpfull, after a breakdown of the lift ( we were travelling with a wheelchair) the staff went out of their way to solve the problem asap, offering free internetacces and coffee whilst waiting.
reviews.title: very nice stay at Gat Xino
Expensive for what it is
reviews.text: Breakfast was a bit boring after a few days, but fresh and plenty.

reviews.title: Awful Hotel
reviews.text: The location is fine, not in the best neighborhood, but never did we experience anything but friendly people, and the Ramblas was only a tree minute walk.

reviews.title: nice place, shame about the breakfast room
reviews.text: Any special requests were promptly dealt with in a very quick and satisfying manner, no extra charge!
